Powell sent an email to Kenneth Duberstein, former White House chief of staff to Ronald Reagan, last year that criticized the book, saying the Cheneys were “idiots and spent force peddling a book that ain’t going nowhere.”

The memoir Powell was referring to was Exceptional: Why the World Needs a Powerful America, a book about American foreign policy that is critical of President Barack Obama.
Former Secretary of State Colin Powell had harsh words for Dick Cheney over a book the former vice president wrote with his daughter Liz in 2015, leaked private emails show.
